onboarding_1: We help you better understand your eating habits
onboarding_1_des: In-depth nutritional analysis helps you track daily meal quality and build a sustainable eating routine..

onboarding_2_des: Get a detailed nutritional breakdown of every meal, including exact amounts of macronutrients and micronutrients.
onboarding_3: Stay on top of your portions and nutrition.
onboarding_3_des: Easily monitor your portion sizes and stay in control of your daily nutrient intake.
